name: Matter Network
tag_list: clean-tech, green-tech, sustainability, corporate-responsibility, alternative-energy, environmental, green-building, green-gadget, green-computing, green-investing, green-transportation, green-travel, news, articles, information, video, media, advertising
overview:
Matter Network is an online media content and advertising syndication company serving the creators and users of clean technologies and sustainability practices. Matter’s syndication network is built upon an alliance of editorially selected, industry-leading web publishing, video production and application companies. The network spans 100+ news sites.

Corporate advertisers attach sponsorships to Matter Network information products and access a select audience of clean technology decision makers, implementers and consumers.

For the month February 2012, comScore reported that Matter Network sites attracted 8.8 million unique visitors and 47 million page views, resulting in Matter Network reaching the second largest audience in comScore’s Green Category. Matter Network topped user engagement among the top five entities in comScore’s Green Category, with time spent per visit on Matter Network sites 58% to 92% greater than any of the other top five.

Note that the Quantcast and Compete data shown below omit metrics for the full network of 100+ sites.
